title: Onboarding - New Home Internet Customer
description: An agent needs to walk a new customer through setting up their modem and activating their service.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's account and confirm their self-install kit has been delivered.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the new customer account.

tasks.description: Provide clear, step-by-step instructions for connecting the modem and router.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the setup process.

tasks.description: Once the modem is online, trigger the service activation from the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the activation signal to the modem.
